column5: Went to get a couple trout from a nearby lake......stared at a blank screen for an hour and decided to head back home.Was a gorgeous day....and despite the slow bite it did not dampen my enthusiasm for being outdoors today.Cleared the snow off the flat roof (holy fricken moly....5 feet deep in one place) then went for a skidoo ride.Getting the feel for the beast now....good fun, my old XLT could never go where this thing goes.YEAH!!!!!!!!!
